ygData.subject: Re: spell changes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I like this one very very much !! So dear friends finaly verant guys found that death penality is too big in world where is so easy to die by thousnds of
ygData.messageBody:
At 11.10 25/05/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Tony B" <tonyb72@...>
>
>the following was posted yesterday. i think it is important for us to
>discuss the changes and what they mean to us. i would also like for new
>players on this list, and wherever this information spreads, to have some
>updated info to work with.
>
>belphenor
>
>
>>- Added the ability to pull one item "charge" from a stack by >holding down
>>the "Control" key when left-clicking on the stack.
>
>has anyone gotten this to work? i tried it, it didnt work.
>>- We have reduced the amount of experience lost when dying by 50%.
>
>too bad; i died several time this weekend =(

I like this one very very much !! So dear friends finaly verant guys found
that death penality is too big in world where is so easy to die by thousnds
of random things wich can provoke it and if you must to pass 3 zones to get
your corpse i think that you will thing twice about daing a same mistake
again.



>>- Magician pets (elemental) will now cast minor spells (to make up >for
>>their lack of kick) - New Magician spells on vendors and some Magician
>>spells have moved >to different vendors - New Magician weapons for Summon
>>Fang & Spear of Warding & Dagger >of Symbols -

Verand dont have expected that there will be so much to do after relase so
they dont balanced lv. after a level 20 they hoped to do this after relase
before too much people come to higer levels, they now must make a swift
moves to cover this. This class is one of last introduced in game beter to
say only enchanters are introduced later and so we also see in this and
previous patch they try to finish this classes.


New enchanter whirl spell
>>(check the vendors) - Whirl now works on MOBS better than it did on the
>>last patch. - The saving throw against Memory Blur and Atone was reduced
>>(harder >to save against) from the last patch. - AC added to the Rune
>>Series (Enchanter) - Alliance series works better (Enchanter) - Enchanter
>>Attack Speed spells now have longer durations (Quickness, Alacrity, etc.) -
>>Tashan (the entire Enchanter series) is now quicker to cast, costs >less
>>mana, and is harder to save against. - New bard songs have been added to
>>the vendors - Paladins lose the spell Bravery, and gain the spell Valor -
>>ShadowKnights and Necromancers gain the Word of Spirit spell (replacing
>>Word of Shadow for the ShadowKnight) - ShadowKnights lose Haunting Corpse
>>and gain Summon Dead - Necromancers and ShadowKnights get a new spell -
>>Shadow Vortex. - ShadowKnights lose Intensify Death (replaced by Shadow
>>Vortex)
>
>any info on these would be helpful. anyone have shadow vortex? i believe it
>replaced umbral messanger, which i would have liked to have...
>
>- Rangers lose Shield of Barbs and gain Shield of Brambles
>- Shorter stun effects will no longer remove longer stun effects (Bash won't
>get rid of whirl, for example)


>- Spell components are now stackable

Yes so finaly we dont have to vaste place for them space is so limited as
we cannot put containers in containers.
